title: I can't sign in in the league of legends
body: I can't sign in in the league of legends, it says the alpha test is currently unavailable. What is this? Why this happen?

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find any recorded client availability issues. This may be caused by an *unstable connection* to our servers if you're still seeing this issue. I'd recommend giving the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) a try, as they commonly resolve connectivity issues to our servers.

Let me know if this helped.
